Name: KeysIn1
About the game: Someone may be confused about name ╮ (─ ▽ ─) ╭, Split it: Keys In 1, Emmm.. 99 in 1 (`· ω · '), got it? As the name implies, KeysIn1 is a software that can collect all softwares' hotkeys. When you using PS, Word, Unity or other softwares, is there any time to use a feature but spent a lot of time looking for where is it? Finally，it's just a simple hotkey to get it. (I often encountered during development... (╯ ° Д °) ╯ (┻ ┻). Here, you can define your own hotkeys to display, from the mainstream to the niche softwares, as long as you want to do, it will be done (~ ~ ▽ ~) ~. Of course, if you find it troublesome, you can download other people's products (* / ω \ *) from Workshop.And if you have also made an awesome set of hotkeys, you can also share it in the Workshop. In the process of using, found any bugs, or have any suggestions, you can contact me via the Steam Community.
